entry.title: Kingsmill - Finest Hot Chocolate Mix Single Serve - 50 x 28 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kingsmill
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 21.99

Kingsmill - Finest Hot Chocolate Single Serve Packets - 50 x 28 g

This Finest Hot Chocolate Single Serve comes with all the flavor and frothiness of decadent cafe drinks without all of the time and effort. Each pack of mix delivers a consistent product each and every time. This mix is designed for use in a hot chocolate or cappuccino machine for bulk preparation, but is also ideal for making individual cups by hand mixing with hot water. The perfect addition to any establishment, this mix is sure to please patrons at your coffee shop, restaurant, concession stand, convenience store, or waiting room.

A simple hot chocolate mix to satisfy those cravings. Add 175mL of hot milk or hot water to contents of the pouch and stir well.

Ingredients: Sugar, corn syrup solids, cocoa, coconut oil, salt, modified milk ingredients, tricalcium phosphate, carboxymethyl, cellulose gum, mono and diglycerides, artificial flavour, dipotassium phosphate, silicon dioxide, maltol, sodium silico aluminate, colour.

entry.title: Lynch - Hot Chocolate Liquid Drink Base - 2 x 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 46.99

Lynch - Hot Chocolate Liquid Drink Base - 4 L

PRODUCT INFORMATION

A premium hot chocolate drink base made from the finest of imported cocoa.

USE IDEAS

Serve Lynch chocolate drink base with whipped cream or marshmallows, or mix with coffee for a mocha hot chocolate. Add peppermint schnapps, Irish whiskey, baileys or brandy for a special treat. Also use drink base for milkshakes and sundae toppings.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Add 1 fl oz (28.4 mL) drink base to 5 fl oz (142 mL) of hot water.

INGREDIENTS

Sugar/glucose-fructose, water, modified milk ingredients, cocoa, canola oil and modified palm and palm kernel oils, hydrogenated coconut oil and hydrogenated soybean oil, palm oil and soybean oil and modified palm oil, salt, artificial flavour, disodium phosphate, soy lecithin, potassium sorbate.

entry.title: Cacao Barry - Plein Arome Cocoa Powder - 6 x 1 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cacao Berry
Type: BAKING
Price: 135.99

Cacao Barry - Plein Arome Cocoa Powder - 6 x 1 Kg

This dark brown cocoa powder is very fragrant and less intense than the Extra Brute. It is ideal for flavoring cake batters, dough's, creams and ice creams and sauces, but not suitable for chocolate powder drinks.

1Kg or 2.2 lbs. 100% Cocoa. 23% Fat, 22% Cocoa Butter. Alkalized/Dutch Processed. Kosher. 24 month shelf life. Product of France.

About Dutch-Processed: Also known as Alkalized cocoa powder which means it has been treated with an alkali to neutralize its acidic nature. Because it is neutral and therefore will not react with baking soda, it should be used in recipes calling for baking powder; unless there are other acidic ingredients in sufficient quantities used; in order for proper leavening to occur.

entry.title: Bensdorp - 100054-722 Superior Red Cocoa Powder 22/24 - 50 Lb
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bensdorp
Type: BAKING
Price: 245.99

Bensdorp - 100054-722 Superior Red Cocoa Powder 22/24 - 50 Lb

This mahogany red cocoa powder is Dutch processed and high in fat. Dutch processing reduces the acidity of cocoa powder. High-fat cocoa powders make richer brownies and cakes.

Bensdorp Dutched Cocoa Powder is wonderful for baking. Try it in brownies and cake for deep chocolate flavor.

Good to Know: Dutch-process cocoa powders are usually for recipes with baking powder as the primary leavening agent or in recipes that do not have a leavening ingredient, like hot chocolate, brownies, and chocolate pudding.

  • Highly Dutched cocoa powder
  • Made from high-quality West African cocoa
  • Low moisture content (4.5%)
  • 22.68 kg bag (50 lbs)
  • Made with finest cocoa beans
  • Cocoa Horizons Program
  • Fairtrade
  • Fairtrade Cocoa Program
  • Rainforest Alliance
  • UTZ
  • Vegan

entry.title: Callebaut - Dark Chocolate Mousse Powder - 800 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Callebaut
Type: BAKING
Price: 17.99

Callebaut - Dark Chocolate Mousse Powder - 800 g

Great taste in just 3 easy steps.
Nothing beats the taste and texture of your homemade chocolate mousse of course, but Callebaut®'s Dark Chocolate Mousse is a great alternative when a busy service requires you to come up with a fast and tasty solution.
Made with 75% Finest Belgian Dark Chocolate, this mousse premix guarantees a delicious result with a rich mouth feel that comes close to homemade chocolate mousse. It enables you to create a wonderfully smooth, well aerated texture and a lovely intense chocolate taste in just 3 simple steps.

Premix for chocolate mousse, rich in dark chocolate.

How to use

A tasty dark chocolate mousse in just 3 easy steps:
1. Mix the contents of one pack with 1 litre of cold milk
2. Beat at full speed for 5 minutes
3. Pipe into cups or glasses and leave to cool in the fridge for approx. 6 hours OR scoop quenelles after cooling

SHELF LIFE

  • 18 months

Disclaimer: BULK MART does NOT recommend shipping chocolate products during the months of June, July, August & September. If you must have chocolate shipped BULK MART recommends choosing the fastest method of shipping possible.

BULK MART CANNOT guarantee the prevention of melting chocolate products, no matter the month or current temperature, even though you may follow our recommendation and CHOOSE the fastest shipping method melting still may occur. Purchase at your own risk.

entry.title: Callebaut - Milk Chocolate Mousse Powder - 800 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Callebaut
Type: BAKING
Price: 17.99

Callebaut - Milk Chocolate Mousse Powder - 800 g - CHMMOM0EX27

Rich in milk chocolate and ready in 1, 2, 3.
Nothing beats homemade chocolate mousse. But with Milk Chocolate Mousse Powder you have a great-tasting alternative at your fingertips. Unrivalled on the market: this chocolate mousse comes close to homemade chocolate mousse, but saves you lots of time.
The secret to its intense and authentic taste lies in the very high chocolate content: it's made with 70% Callebaut® milk chocolate.
Simply mix one bag of powder with 1 litre of milk and beat it for 5 minutes at full speed. It has the rich texture that is perfect for piping in glasses and scooping 'quenelles' on dessert plates. 
Our chefs recommend piping the mousse in glasses before cooling to preserve its nicely aerated texture. Quenelles should be scooped after cooling once the mousse has sufficiently set.

Powder mix for instant milk chocolate mousse preparations.

How to use

A tasty milk chocolate mousse in just 3 easy steps:
1. Mix the contents of one pack with 1 litre of cold milk
2. Beat at full speed for 5 minutes
3. Pipe into cups or glasses and leave to cool in the fridge for approx. 6 hours OR scoop quenelles after cooling

SHELF LIFE

  • 18 months

CERTIFICATIONS

  • Halal
